name: Weight Loss Challenge
description:
MOTIV8 CHALLENGE                  

Cost : $25.00 which is non-refundable. The prizes, motivation, encouragement, and support definitely surpass that cost. Im sure you have spent that amount of money on something far less important than improving your health/life. 

Length of Challenge : 6 weeks

Who can participate : Women

Prize: CASH - amount solely depends on the number of people in the challenge. The prize amount will be given to all participants on the 1st day of each challenge. 



F.A.Q.

Whats required? 

Dedication * Motivation to change your life, your eating habits, and your fitness
A Facebook page - you will be placed in a private group with other members of the Motiv8! challenge
Access to internet and a camera to take required pics that will be emailed once a week


What will I be provided with?

A grocery shopping list- to use as a guide
Chart to track your percentage lost
All challenge rules 
A private facebook group of members in the challenge.
Weekly Recipes
Support, Tips, Guidance from admin
Once your entrance fee is paid - you will receive challenge documents by email prior to the start date.

name: Women's Inspiration Band
description:
Front
Sweat 2day * Smile 2morrow
Back
motiv8change.com

What will this band inspire you to do or remind you of?
-to work out harder
-never give up
-stay focused
-how far you've come in your journey
-you can do it
-you will reach your goals
-and you're not alone in this journey

Once you receive your band, we want to see you wearing it! 
Post it on Instagram - tag us @motiv8change and #motiv8change
or Tag us on Facebook!
